relation: This college's education is good as far as I can tell and it is definitely affordable. It is a great option for those of us who can't afford education elsewhere.
Food and drinks are good in my opinion.
I don't live in the dorms.
pageTitle: Arizona Western College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {211902=What I do for fun at Arizona Western College are several things. Even though it's a small college you can still relax and have fun when classes start to give headaches. First, I go to the gym; there I can workout and think of something else but homework. Second, I go to events. There's a movie night out coming up this October, and I'm going. And lastly, I write at the library., 64103=I really like how polite the faculty and the students act towards new freshmen. The staff is very supportive and helpful. I look forward to starting my Fall 2013 classes., 281969=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: AWC allows for many different experiences. I have taken classes on the main campus in Yuma, and have also attended classes at the San Luis branch. Both campuses offer a range of people and learning experiences that fill up what you might miss just taking one of their online classes. Login to rate or flag the reviews Roxanna from Somerton, AZ 10/12/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 3 people found this review useful. 2 of 71 Categories Comments Bang for the buck AWC, I believe, is like any other community college. The prices all depend on the credits you take. The good thing is that you can save on books by buying them off other students for a lot cheaper. Am enjoying being here I enjoy attending AWC, because since this is my hometown I know a lot of the people here.
